LlNCOLN FIREFIGHTERS ASSOCIATION 241 VICTORY LANE • LINCOLN, NE 68528 Off: (402) 475-6440 • Fax: (402) 475-6442 LOCAL NO. 644 February 16, 2001 The Honorable Joseph Moaldey United States House of Representatives Washington, DC 20515-2109 Dear Representative Moakley: I am writing to express my support of your legislation establishing guidelines for reduced ignition propensity (fire-safe) cigarettes; specifically your bill drafted July 18, 2000, Nobody knows the dangers of fires more than the Fire Fighters whose jobs are to fight them. We have seen first hand the personal loss and property damage that is a result of careless handling of cigarettes. Your legislation would be a huge step in the right direction by establishing an industry standard for safety. If lives and property are saved, your work to pass this legislation will be worth it.
